quizitems.questiontext: During a Nazi rally in Charlottesville, which President said there were 'good people on both sides'?
Which president colluded with the Russian government to steal the 2016 presidential election?
Which president proudly claimed about women that he could "grab em by the pussy" because he was a star?
Who is the only president to never release his tax returns and thus hide the many conflicts of interest he has?
Which president routinely holds rallys where he encourages his supports to act violently towards members of the media?
Which president claimed of ruthless North Korean dictator Kim Jong-un that they fell in love after writing letters to each other?
Which president committed election fraud by paying $130,000 to a porn star to keep an affair quiet days before the election?
Which president believes Vladimir Putin over all US intelligence agencies about Russias role in the 2016 election?
Who is the most corrupt and dishonest president in the history of The United States?
